text: Tara pichata yetiya mucha'i amara taraphara paraa satya lai sihamtara ocarata upasthita ha’la, sihamte ka’le, ‘muchara lagata yisakale imana aniche, sihamtara putra santana bilakaka hatya karaa arau sihamtara naraisakalaka jiraita erai diya’. Arau kaphirasakalara sarayantra kerala byarthahe haya
